Class RoomSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.GUIEntity

  • public class RoomSprite
extends GUIEntity
    This class keeps track of all of the rooms and document rooms that need to be drawn to screen.
